configStructure.name: templateOne
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by '#'. To add or clauses use '|'. To check many properties of this type, separate properties by ';'. For example, write p1#q1|q3;p2#q2 to check properties 1) p1 cannot happen after q1 or q3 and 2) p2 cannot happen after q2.

configStructure.name: templateTwo
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by '#'. To add or clauses use '|'. To check many properties of this type, separate properties by ';'.

configStructure.name: templateThree
configStructure.displayName: Type 3: If <action> happens, <action> can happen only after <action> happens
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by '#'. To add or clauses use '|'. To check many properties of this type, separate properties by ';'.

configStructure.name: templateFour
configStructure.displayName: Type 4: <action> will eventually happen after <action> happens
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by '#'. To add or clauses use '|'. To check many properties of this type, separate properties by ';'.
